title: Border, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: cross stitch embroidery
description: Valance or border in heavy white cotton embroidered in dark blue cotton in a design of five large detached roundels containing highly stylized plants and animals. Border has a design of stylized flowers.
